name: shimmer
title: Shimmer
description: Wrap children with a configurable shimmer loading effect.
docs: Make sure your project has the `cn` helper (run `npx shadcn@latest init` or `npx shadcn@latest add utils`). Usage: `import { Shimmer } from "@/components/shimmer"` then `Loading...`. Override colors via CSS vars: `[--shimmer-base:theme(colors.gray.900)] [--shimmer-highlight:theme(colors.gray.300)]`.
